IPtoCompany.PasteYourAccessToken: Paste in the field below your access token.
IPtoCompany.WantToReceiveDailyReport: I want to receive the daily reports by email with the name of the company that visited my websites.
IPtoCompany.NoOneVisitedWebsiteYesterday: We are sorry, but no one visited your website yesterday...
IPtoCompany.FindBelowCompaniesReport: You'll find below the Companies Report for the day of yesterday.
IPtoCompany.LifeTimeOfCacheForResultsInWeeks: Number of weeks during which the results returned must be cached.
